siteMetadata.title: Book Notes by Tiffany
siteMetadata.subtitle: I'm Tiffany, a software developer who likes books. I write about them here.

frontmatter.title: 10 Minute Declutter: It Brings Me Joy
frontmatter.description: With all the talk about Marie Kondo's new Netflix Series, Tidying Up which is based on her book, The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up: The Japanese Art of Decluttering and Organizing, 10 Minute Declutter is an alternative to Kondo's book and cheaper.

frontmatter.title: 10 Minute Digital Declutter, a Book for Grandma
frontmatter.description: This book, although written in 2015, is outdated. By a lot.
